title: 一个log的小问题，控制台日志输出两次
body:
使用的是ERNIE静态图，如下，在训练/推理时，日志输出会出现2次，但两次的格式不同
```
2020-06-19 02:25:45,347-INFO: attention_probs_dropout_prob: 0.1
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,347 [    ernie.py:   52]:	attention_probs_dropout_prob: 0.1
2020-06-19 02:25:45,347-INFO: hidden_act: relu
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,347 [    ernie.py:   52]:	hidden_act: relu
2020-06-19 02:25:45,347-INFO: hidden_dropout_prob: 0.1
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,347 [    ernie.py:   52]:	hidden_dropout_prob: 0.1
2020-06-19 02:25:45,347-INFO: hidden_size: 768
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,347 [    ernie.py:   52]:	hidden_size: 768
2020-06-19 02:25:45,347-INFO: initializer_range: 0.02
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,347 [    ernie.py:   52]:	initializer_range: 0.02
2020-06-19 02:25:45,348-INFO: max_position_embeddings: 513
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,348 [    ernie.py:   52]:	max_position_embeddings: 513
2020-06-19 02:25:45,348-INFO: num_attention_heads: 12
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,348 [    ernie.py:   52]:	num_attention_heads: 12
2020-06-19 02:25:45,348-INFO: num_hidden_layers: 12
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,348 [    ernie.py:   52]:	num_hidden_layers: 12
2020-06-19 02:25:45,348-INFO: type_vocab_size: 2
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,348 [    ernie.py:   52]:	type_vocab_size: 2
2020-06-19 02:25:45,348-INFO: vocab_size: 18000
[INFO] 2020-06-19 02:25:45,348 [    ernie.py:   52]:	vocab_size: 18000
```
我检查了log的用法，似乎没有问题，那么请问这是什么原因呢？
